cards.name: Deathmark
cards.text: Destroy target green or white creature.
cards.flavor: "I hope it's true that every snowflake is unique, because I never want to see one like this again. Now clean up that body."—Thangbrand Gyrdsson, Kjeldoran patrol

cards.name: Death Ward
cards.text: Regenerate target creature.

cards.name: Deathgrip
cards.text: {B}{B}: Counter target green spell.

cards.name: Deathlace
cards.text: Target spell or permanent becomes black. (Mana symbols on that permanent remain unchanged.)

cards.name: Strands of Undeath
cards.text: Enchant creature When Strands of Undeath enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards. {B}: Regenerate enchanted creature.
cards.flavor: "Why limit yourself to mortal law when you can outlive those who enforce it?"—Czaric, Orzhov prelate

cards.name: Horseshoe Crab
cards.text: {U}: Untap Horseshoe Crab.
cards.flavor: "Hmm . . . It looks kinda like a bug. Let's crack it open an' see if it tastes like one!"—Squee, goblin cabin hand

cards.name: Cement Shoes
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +3/+3 and has "At the beginning of your end step, tap this creature." "Equipped creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step."
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Shoe Tree
cards.text: Shoe Tree enters the battlefield with up to two shoe counters on it. Use your shoes as counters. Shoe Tree gets +1/+1 for each shoe counter on it.
cards.flavor: It grows several feet a year.

cards.name: Scathe Zombies
cards.flavor: "They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose, Nor spake, nor moved their eyes; It had been strange, even in a dream, To have seen those dead men rise."—Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

cards.name: Cathartic Reunion
cards.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard two cards. Draw three cards.
cards.flavor: The chasm of years and worlds collapsed under the power of their embrace.

cards.name: Dragon Roost
cards.text: {5}{R}{R}: Create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
cards.flavor: Dragons erupt from peaks of chaos and flow from rivers of molten rage.

cards.name: Shivan Dragon
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

cards.name: Dragon's Claw
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: Though no longer attached to the hand, it still holds its adversary in its grasp.

cards.name: Dragon Whelp
cards.text: Flying {R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor: "O to be a dragon . . . of silkworm size or immense . . ."—Marianne Moore, "O to Be a Dragon"

cards.name: Shivan Dragon
cards.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: While it's true most Dragons are cruel, the Shivan Dragon seems to take particular glee in the misery of others, often tormenting its victims much like a cat plays with a mouse before delivering the final blow.

cards.name: Dragonlord Dromoka
cards.text: This spell can't be countered. Flying, lifelink Your opponents can't cast spells during your turn.
cards.flavor: Dromoka's followers forsake blood ties so that they may join a greater family.

cards.name: Dragon Mask
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)
cards.flavor: "With no further options, I was forced to don the mask."—Rashida Scalebane

cards.name: Chaos Dragon
cards.text: Flying, haste Chaos Dragon attacks each combat if able. At the beginning of combat on your turn, each player rolls a d20. If one or more opponents had the highest result, Chaos Dragon can't attack those players or planeswalkers they control this combat.

cards.name: White Dragon
cards.text: Flying Cold Breath — When White Dragon enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.name: Blue Dragon
cards.text: Flying Lightning Breath — When Blue Dragon enters the battlefield, until your next turn, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-0, up to one other target creature gets -2/-0, and up to one other target creature gets -1/-0.

cards.name: Black Dragon
cards.text: Flying Acid Breath — When Black Dragon enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Red Dragon
cards.text: Flying Fire Breath — When Red Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to each opponent.

cards.name: Green Dragon
cards.text: Flying Poison Breath — When Green Dragon enters the battlefield, until end of turn, whenever a creature an opponent controls is dealt damage, destroy it.

cards.name: Adult Gold Dragon
cards.text: Flying, lifelink, haste

cards.name: Dragon Turtle
cards.text: Flash Drag Below — When Dragon Turtle enters the battlefield, tap it and up to one target creature an opponent controls. They don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.

cards.name: Horned Turtle
cards.flavor: It doesn't like having visitors . . . unless it's having them for lunch.
